Open DaysExperience ISH for yourself

Discover ISH for yourself

We understand how important it is to be confident about your choice. Our open days are tailor-made to provide you with an immersive and engaging experience that showcases our unique approach to hospitality education and gives you a better perspective on what your studies with us will be like. What to expect

What to expect

Mini-lectures and demonstrations

Experience the ISH education philosophy for yourself with our special open day lectures that will welcome you to our institution and introduce you to the world of hospitality. Better yet, you’ll have the opportunity to see hands on demonstrations led by our faculty to give you a taste of our practical workshops.

Get to know the faculty

Our team and faculty will be available throughout the day to introduce themselves, as well as answer any questions you might have.

Full campus tour

See our cutting-edge campus for yourself with our campus tour that will familiarise you with our facilities, location, and our unique campus design.

Explore the locale

We’ll be taking you on a tour of the township and its amenities, including a showcasing of student accommodation.

Q&A sessions

At the end of the open day, we’ll be hosting a Q&A session with a panel of our team to ensure all of your ISH related queries are answered.

How to sign up:

To sign up for an open day, simply fill in the form below and a member of our team will get back to you as soon as open day dates become available, giving you the freedom to choose the most comfortable option for yourself.
